official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income annual interest on payments by any foreign governments of reparations to survivors of Nazi concentration camps or other Nazi-era atrocities. Permits a one-time income tax deduction from gross income of the sum total of the annual interest derived from such payments made after May 7, 1945.
